remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性設`true`來將個別資料格為唯讀。Set the property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only. 設定屬性設`true`唯讀狀態，請在個別資料行中進行所有儲存格。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only. 設定屬性，以`true`進行中的所有資料格唯讀模式之間設定的衝突是否，直條圖和資料格層級，值為`true`值中的優先順序高於`false`.Set the property to `true` to make all cells in the read-only If there is a conflict between the settings at the , column, and cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 報告已按下按鍵。

span.span: Reports that a key was pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會傳遞鍵盤輸入，其中包含儲存格。This method passes keyboard input to the that contains the cell. 每個資料行處理適用於資料行類型的方式輸入。Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSelected(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnSelected (e As RoutedEventArgs)
abstract member OnSelected : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit override this.OnSelected : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫在衍生類別中，請確定您呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.
